name: Medium Zip Around Purse With Rexy And Carriage
description: Crafted in polished pebble leather, this wallet unzips for easy access to its well-organized interior. It features a playful twist on our Horse and Carriage icon featuring mascot Rexy in a cool glittery rainbow ombré. Ten card slots, a full-length bill compartment and a zip coin pocket keep everyday essentials neatly tucked away.

6.5 x 3.75 x 0.75 inches
(length x height x width)
